name: Amendment 35 Tobacco Tax
summary: Increased tobacco taxes and directed revenue to health-related programs

name: Referendum C Revenue Retention
summary: Allowed the state to retain and spend revenue above previous TABOR limits

name: Amendment 66 Income Tax Proposal
summary: Proposed an income tax increase for education funding and was rejected

name: Amendment 73 High Income Tax
summary: Proposed higher income tax rates for high earners for school funding and was rejected

name: Proposition 116 Income Tax Rate Reduction
summary: Reduced the state income tax rate from 4.63 percent to 4.55 percent

name: Amendment B Gallagher Repeal
summary: Repealed the Gallagher Amendment affecting residential and nonresidential property assessment ratios

name: Proposition 121 Income Tax Rate Reduction
summary: Reduced the state income tax rate from 4.55 percent to 4.40 percent

name: Proposition HH Property Tax Measure
summary: Proposed property tax changes and TABOR refund impacts and was rejected
